parameters.name: AnalysisType
parameters.description: The type of analytics. Set the value to **BigKey**.

parameters.name: Date
parameters.description: The date to query. You can query the report for one day each time. Specify the date in the *yyyy-MM-dd*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the child node in the cluster instance.

>  If you do not specify this parameter, the analysis results of all child nodes in the instance are returned.

parameters.name: PageNumbers
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

> If the parameter value exceeds the maximum number of the returned pages, an empty large key list is returned.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**.

> The default value is **30**.
